constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 138 (Tuesday, August 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCLINTOCK:
H.R. 4915.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 4, Section 3, Clause 2 of the U.S. Constitution,
which confers on Congress the power to make all needful Rules
and Regulations respecting the property belonging to the
United States.
[Page H4313]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: Water Supply Permitting Coordination Act
